about.summary: Implementation of the BC3NET algorithm for gene regulatory network inference (de Matos Simoes and Frank Emmert-Streib, Bagging Statistical Network Inference from Large-Scale Gene Expression Data, PLoS ONE 7(3): e33624, <doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0033624>).

name: r-bc3net
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bc3net
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bc3net_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bc3net/bc3net_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 506ca8d5bab1e915bda38014b26a518df103cb4e64211ecf81e1e8b04183af95

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-c3net
    - r-igraph
    - r-infotheo
    - r-lattice
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-c3net
    - r-igraph
    - r-infotheo
    - r-lattice

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bc3net')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bc3net')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=bc3net
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: 'Implementation of the BC3NET algorithm for gene regulatory network inference (de
    Matos Simoes and Frank Emmert-Streib, Bagging Statistical Network Inference from
    Large-Scale Gene Expression Data, PLoS ONE 7(3): e33624, <doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0033624>).'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bc3net
# Version: 1.0.4
# Date: 2016-11-26
# Title: Gene Regulatory Network Inference with Bc3net
# Authors@R: c(person("Ricardo", "de Matos Simoes", role=c("aut","cre"), email="ricardo_dematossimoes@dfci.harvard.edu"), person("Frank", "Emmert-Streib", role=c("aut"), email="v@bio-complexity.com"))
# Author: Ricardo de Matos Simoes [aut, cre], Frank Emmert-Streib [aut]
# Maintainer: Ricardo de Matos Simoes <ricardo_dematossimoes@dfci.harvard.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0), c3net, infotheo, igraph, Matrix, lattice
# Suggests:
# Description: Implementation of the BC3NET algorithm for gene regulatory network inference (de Matos Simoes and Frank Emmert-Streib, Bagging Statistical Network Inference from Large-Scale Gene Expression Data, PLoS ONE 7(3): e33624, <doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0033624>).
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Repository: CRAN
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-11-27 21:32:12 UTC; ricardo
# Date/Publication: 2016-11-28 08:21:04
